message.name: ERR_TRIGGERTYPE_FV_WRONGTYPE
message.locale: The trigger type is not valid for a participant.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEKEY_FV_CASTERROR
message.locale: The record identifier specified is not a ConcernRoleKey.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEKEY_FV_NOT_SET
message.locale: The ConcernRoleKey has not been set.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEID_FV_NOVALUE
message.locale: The concern role ID has not been specified.

message.name: ERR_MESSAGEBUILD_FV_BUILDFAILURE
message.locale: The building of the message structure failed.
